title: An Innocent Girl:  Episode 51
itunes:subtitle: Scotland, July 2011.  A fire at a flat claims the lives of three members of the same family and police find out the blaze was started deliberately.  Just who would be capable of murdering innocent children and why?  This episode of the UK True Crime We...
content:encoded:
Scotland, July 2011. A fire at a flat claims the lives of three members of the same family and police find out the blaze was started deliberately. Just who would be capable of murdering innocent children and why? This episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast explores the lives of two of the players in the drugs business of a Scottish town along with the associated feuds and violence.
